title: Recognize and Treat Heat Cramps
brief: Identify and treat heat cramps caused by salt loss from excessive sweating.
steps: Step 1: Recognize symptoms: moderate to severe muscle cramps in legs, arms, or abdomen, starting as mild discomfort.
Step 2: Immediately stop all physical activity.
Step 3: Get into shade as quickly as possible.
Step 4: Drink water to replace lost fluids.
Step 5: Rest until symptoms subside completely.
Step 6: If cramps persist or worsen, treat as heat exhaustion.
warnings: Do not ignore early mild muscular discomfort - it will progress to severe cramps.
Continuing activity after symptoms appear will worsen the condition.
Heat cramps can progress to more serious heat injuries if not treated.
